channel.title: Assault minigame
channel.description:
hey guys i wanna add an assault minigame (i will have to change npc spots i have funpk there)
and i dont wanna steal from another source does anyone have a guide?
i also would like a shop

item.title: Assault minigame
item.dc:creator: @Butchd12 Butchd12
item.description:
@Butchd12 wrote:

Heres a hint: Your going to want to add a specific NPC you want in there, then move a few of them in there… Then when the NPC is killed you get a assault point, your going to want to add that in the playersave.java file, then for the shop, your going to want to declare a new shop for a specific NPC, then move that NPC to where you want the shop by doing ::mypos. then in the shops.cfg or whatever your using, your gonna want to make a new shop line, its not that hard, just remember… ONE STEP AT A TIME

Read full topic
